title: My Shop refreshed
body: I opened this month's shop, I got a 70% discount on pug maw and I was about to buy him. After restarting league my shop refreshed and my pug maw disappeared. I opened the new shop and got a 60% discount on pug maw which is out of the range of my current RP, whereas I was able to afford it at a 70% discount.

replies.body: No worries! We can still help you get that better deal, just hit me back up in this thread saying it's okay to add the skin and remove the 292 RP cost ^_^
It would be ok to add the skin and remove 292 rp from my account. Thanks, greatly appreciated!
Added ^_^! Give that pupper a good pet for me when you use him!
